page.title: 02G.E.C. Industrial project
page.content: The G.E.C is a very large company, it does all different kinds of things. One of the main qualities are computers, they have five different computers. They buy computers and make them bigger. They have three of their own computers. One is for jobs, the second is for telling them if one goes wrong and the third one is spare. They have a computer system which you can phone a message into and it goes on a disc. The computers go to steel works and they also go abroad. There are about 600 people working in the G.E.C, it all depends on the amount of workmen off sick. They have a little computer which is very powerful and slower.
